co.cask.cdap.template.etl.api

Interface PipelineConfigurer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AdapterPluginRegistry

    @Beta
public interface PipelineConfigurer
extends AdapterPluginRegistry
    Configures an ETL Pipeline. Allows adding datasets and streams, which will be created when a pipeline is created.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDatasetModule(String moduleName, Class<? extends DatasetModule> moduleClass)
      Adds a DatasetModule to be deployed during pipeline creation if it does not already exist.
      void addDatasetType(Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass)
      Adds a DatasetModule to be deployed automatically during pipeline creation if it does not already exist.
      void addStream(Stream stream)
      Adds a Stream to the pipeline.
      void createDataset(String datasetName, Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass, DatasetProperties props)
      Adds a Dataset instance to the pipeline.
      void createDataset(String datasetName, String typeName, DatasetProperties properties)
      Adds a Dataset instance to the pipeline.

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.templates.AdapterPluginRegistry

        usePlugin, usePlugin, usePluginClass, usePluginClass

    • Method Detail

      • addStream

        void addStream(Stream stream)
        Adds a Stream to the pipeline. The stream will be created during pipeline creation if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        stream - the Stream to add to the pipeline

      • addDatasetModule

        void addDatasetModule(String moduleName,
                    Class<? extends DatasetModule> moduleClass)
        Adds a DatasetModule to be deployed during pipeline creation if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - the name of the module to deploy
        moduleClass - the class of the module

      • addDatasetType

        void addDatasetType(Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass)
        Adds a DatasetModule to be deployed automatically during pipeline creation if it does not already exist. Uses Dataset as a base for the DatasetModule. The module will have a single dataset type identical to the name of the class in the datasetClass parameter.
        Parameters:
        datasetClass - the class of the dataset, with the module name the same as the class in the parameter

      • createDataset

        void createDataset(String datasetName,
                 String typeName,
                 DatasetProperties properties)
        Adds a Dataset instance to the pipeline. The Dataset instance will be created during pipeline creation if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the dataset instance
        typeName - the name of the dataset type
        properties - the properties of the dataset instance

      • createDataset

        void createDataset(String datasetName,
                 Class<? extends Dataset> datasetClass,
                 DatasetProperties props)
        Adds a Dataset instance to the pipeline. The Dataset instance will be created during pipeline creation if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - dataset instance name
        datasetClass - dataset class to create the Dataset type from
        props - dataset instance properties
